English.DisplayReords: Are you sure you want to display {0} records ?

English.SystemMessage_DataSource_NoColumnName: All predefined columns must have a name.

English.SystemMessage_Double_mathExpression: The mathematical expression for '{0}' is not valid.

English.SystemMessage_List_maxLength: Value must be at least {0} characters.
English.SystemMessage_UniqueValueRequired: Similiar value in field '{0}' already exists.
English.SystemMessage_Int: Numeric value in '{0}' is not valid.
English.SystemMessage_Dec: Decimal value in '{0}' is not valid.
English.SystemMessage_Date: Value in '{0}' is not a valid date ({1} is valid date).
English.SystemMessage_MinLength: '{0}' must be at least {1} characters long.
English.SystemMessage_MaxLength: '{0}' can not contain more than {1} characters.
English.SystemMessage_Email: '{0}' is not a valid email address.
English.SystemMessage_Validate: Value in '{0}' has not the valid expression required for this column.
English.PagerStatus: Displaying page {0} of {1}, records {2} to {3} of {4} records.
